name: Gummies Hardware
description:
"Oh hi, Boss? Sorry to bother you. I know it's your day off but... there's this old guy here asking for "chipotle salsa" paint?"

It may be your day off but as the boss of Gummies Hardware, it's your job to field calls from your nervous employees, Jimmy. Pick up the phone, use your device's mic to respond and help solve Jimmy's problems... whatever they may be.

Works best in Chrome (sorry!)

Handcrafted by:

Andrew Capela - Designer & Programmer

Ben Taylor - Designer & Programmer

Bryce Halliday - Sound Engineer & Voice Actor

James Hofman - Writer & Designer

Meri Amber - Voice Actor

Scott Newton - Writer & Designer
